assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Turpaz Industries Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, primarily provides various natural fragrances and flavors worldwide. The company operates through Taste, Fragrance, Specialty Ingredients, and Specialty Intermediaries for the Pharma Industry segments. The Taste segment develops, produces, markets, and sells natural and synthesized, sweet, taste extracts, and functional solutions for baking, seasonings, and gluten free flours. The Fragrance segment develops, produces, markets, and sells natural and synthesized fragrance extracts for cosmetics, toiletries, detergents, wet wipes, scented candles, hair care, air care, and odor neutralizers sectors. The Specialty Intermediaries for the Pharma Industry segment engages in production of specialty chemicals. The Specialty Ingredients segment develops, produces, markets, and sells specialty ingredients for flavors and fragrances, agrochemicals, polymers and catalysts, and citrus product related sectors. The company was formerly known as BKF Perfume Compounding Ltd. and changed its name to Turpaz Industries Ltd in January 2021. Turpaz Industries Ltd was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Holon, Israel.
